org.apache.spark.input

Class StreamFileInputFormat<T>

  • Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamInputFormat

    public abstract class StreamFileInputFormat<T>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.CombineFileInputFormat<String,T>
    A general format for reading whole files in as streams, byte arrays, or other functions to be added
